decision_conditions:
Product Samples:
Interpon Powder Coatings ‘Gris 2000 Sable’; Future Metal Barley Chalu ‘Champagne PAN31’; ‘AnoAli’ metal cladding ‘Matt Etch E6 finish’; Balustrade Sampe; Schüco AWS window systems brochure; Schüco façade systems FWS ‘aluminium stick curtain wall system’; photos of balustrade.

Drawings:
5th floor curtain wall/window drawing schedule, drawing no’s 284-GSS-00-BSF-DR-05000; 284-GSS-00-BSF-DR-05002; 284-GSS-00-BSF-DR-05003; Level 05 Balustrade Full Length (Rev A); 13715-PCO-05-DR-A-34401; L05 Curtain Wall Mock Up Sample (Rev P03); 50-56 Great Sutton St - Great Sutton Street Elevation (Metal Balustrading).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of details pursuant to condition 3 (materials) of planning permission ref. P2024/0607 dated 12/08/2024: 'Removal and replacement of roof structures at the fifth-floor level of 50-56 Great Sutton Street with associated alterations to facilitate the delivery of office space (Class E) associated with planning permission ref. P2023/2609/FUL.'
